name: gl-react-dom
author: GaÃ«tan Renaudeau <renaudeau.gaetan@gmail.com>
description: DOM implementation of gl-react, an universal React library to write and compose WebGL shaders

scripts.build: cd ../.. && export PATH=$(npm bin):$PATH && cd - && rm -rf gl-react-dom.js && browserify lib/index.js -t [ browserify-shim ] --standalone GLReactDOM > gl-react-dom.js
